ing: 1 tablespoon fresh chopped cilantro, for garnish
des: "This recipe makes a delicious side dish when paired with yellow rice."
ins: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook the garlic in the oil 15 seconds. Stir in the onion and green pepper; cook and stir 10 minutes. Pour in the black beans and beer; simmer until thick, about 15 minutes; garnish with cilantro.
